tool_description: Convert text to image-file or html-image-tag.
name: Text-to-Image-Api
title: Text-to-Image-Api

api_list.name: ImgTag
api_list.description: Convert text to Html Image-Tag (ex: ).

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text string which you want to convert to image.

optional_parameters.name: imgHeight
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Image height (Default: 300 px), and if zero then will auto-size according to text-height of selected font-size.

optional_parameters.name: backColor
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Background color in hexadecimal value (Default: White = #ffffff). Note: Should start with # prefix, and each basic-color (red, green, blue) should has two hex-digits.

optional_parameters.name: foreColor
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Foreground color in hexadecimal value (Default: Black = #000000). Note: Should start with # prefix, and each basic-color (red, green, blue) should has two hex-digits.

optional_parameters.name: imgWidth
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Image width (Default: 300 px), and if zero then will auto-size according to text-width of selected font-size.
